body:
I'm not an anti-Semite, I think Hitler was evil and have no interest in participating in such a guild as this one seems to be.

However, I'm disappointed with Ruqqus for this censorship. So much for "free speech" on Ruqqus.

If there are specific incidents of conspiring to violate laws, then action by administrators are justified. But others sharing thoughts and ideas, no matter how disagreeable – hell no!

"Though I may disagree with what you say, I will defend to the ban your right to say it."

body:
**Note:** all of the rest of this aside, the biggest issue is the manner in which it happened. You did it at the request of your discord buddies, and then laughed about it like banning is funny, and you and all of the participants clearly enjoyed your high of power. At least you did it in public, unlike reddit which does so in secret places like DefaultMods instead.

---

You said saying Hitler was the good guy is not permitted on the site. It's not okay, but it doesn't break the rules unless they're specifically calling for genocide (and actually planning on it, not just basement-dwellers who are trolling everyone) and most Nazis deny the Holocaust. And unless the *whole guild* was about that, you only remove the specific offending accounts and posts. Even if guildmasters were doing it, ban their accounts and let the remaining mods or someone else have the guild.

> Also, @CrystalVulpine is willfully ignoring the half dozen or so nazi guilds that aren't banned because they aren't breaking the rules.

Not true, remember JosephGoebbels and others?

body:
<span style="color: #ff69b4"> Yes, and so does the overwhelming majority of the Jewish community. Brit milah is exclusive to a scant few ultra-orthodox enclaves. It’s not “jewish” any more or less than the [overwhelmingly Christian child marriage epidemic in the US](https://www.cbsnews.com/amp/news/child-marriage-united-states-donna-pollard/) is Christian. You have no personality whatsoever beyond obsessing over jews, blacks and LGBTQIIAwhatever. None. Whatsoever. You barely qualify as sentient. You will die as you lived - alone, unmourned, unnoticed by all but your immediate family. They will feel relieved, and guilty for feeling relieved. But not very guilty.

<span style="color: #ff69b4">Regardless of the legitimacy of brit milah as an extremely fringe cultural thing, titling the thread in such a way inherently and undeniably sexualizes the photograph. This runs indisputably afoul of content policy. It also skirts US legality, since it’s an actual photo. Let me educate you on our laws, just a bit.

<span style="color: #ff69b4">Bardfinn’s assertion that the non-sexual photos of naked children aren’t legally child porn is correct. It’s a shitty law that needs to be addressed, but for now, it is what it is. Under US law, nudity is not inherently sexual. It’s why films like *American Beauty* are capable of being seen as a cinematic masterpiece instead of being illegal to possess. The nudity isn’t sexual. A photo a mother takes of her infant in the bath isn’t sexual, she doesn’t go to prison for that. If she uploads the photo somewhere and sexualizes it, though, that’s when it legally goes from “fine” to “child pornography” in the eyes of the law. Similarly, that thread title sexualized the photo you are defending, which was - again - a photo of an adult man with a child’s penis in his mouth.

<span style="color: #ff69b4">I realize that you don’t actually care about any of this, and you only want to cry about Jews, but I am boundlessly charitable and patient. This will stay on-topic or you will continue to be ignored. For anyone else confused, a helpful lesson in American law.
body_html:
Yes, and so does the overwhelming majority of the Jewish community. Brit milah is exclusive to a scant few ultra-orthodox enclaves. It’s not “jewish” any more or less than the overwhelmingly Christian child marriage epidemic in the US is Christian. You have no personality whatsoever beyond obsessing over jews, blacks and LGBTQIIAwhatever. None. Whatsoever. You barely qualify as sentient. You will die as you lived - alone, unmourned, unnoticed by all but your immediate family. They will feel relieved, and guilty for feeling relieved. But not very guilty.

Regardless of the legitimacy of brit milah as an extremely fringe cultural thing, titling the thread in such a way inherently and undeniably sexualizes the photograph. This runs indisputably afoul of content policy. It also skirts US legality, since it’s an actual photo. Let me educate you on our laws, just a bit.

Bardfinn’s assertion that the non-sexual photos of naked children aren’t legally child porn is correct. It’s a shitty law that needs to be addressed, but for now, it is what it is. Under US law, nudity is not inherently sexual. It’s why films like American Beauty are capable of being seen as a cinematic masterpiece instead of being illegal to possess. The nudity isn’t sexual. A photo a mother takes of her infant in the bath isn’t sexual, she doesn’t go to prison for that. If she uploads the photo somewhere and sexualizes it, though, that’s when it legally goes from “fine” to “child pornography” in the eyes of the law. Similarly, that thread title sexualized the photo you are defending, which was - again - a photo of an adult man with a child’s penis in his mouth.

I realize that you don’t actually care about any of this, and you only want to cry about Jews, but I am boundlessly charitable and patient. This will stay on-topic or you will continue to be ignored. For anyone else confused, a helpful lesson in American law.
